title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is noticed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: All tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively when resizing the window in the vertical direction in the control example.
EB: The flashing issue in the Control Example needs to be investigated and resolved.
SR: Investigate and fix the flashing issue in the Control Example by making sure that tabs in the TabFolder and Frames do not flash excessively when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
